type.name: nodeConnectorProperties
type.documentation: The class describes set of properties attached to a node connector

type.name: nodeProperties
type.documentation: The class describes set of properties attached to a node

element.name: nodeConnector
element.examplexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <nodeConnector id="..." type="..."> <node id="..." type="..." /> </nodeConnector>

element.name: nodeConnectorProperties
element.documentation: The class describes set of properties attached to a node connector
element.examplexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <nodeConnectorProperties> <nodeconnector id="..." type="..."> <node id="..." type="..." /> </nodeconnector> <properties> <actions>...</actions> <actions>...</actions> <!--...more "actions" elements...--> <advertisedBandwidth>...</advertisedBandwidth> <advertisedBandwidth>...</advertisedBandwidth> <!--...more "advertisedBandwidth" elements...--> <bandwidth>...</bandwidth> <bandwidth>...</bandwidth> <!--...more "bandwidth" elements...--> <buffers>...</buffers> <buffers>...</buffers> <!--...more "buffers" elements...--> <capabilities>...</capabilities> <capabilities>...</capabilities> <!--...more "capabilities" elements...--> <config>...</config> <config>...</config> <!--...more "config" elements...--> <latency>...</latency> <latency>...</latency> <!--...more "latency" elements...--> <macAddress>...</macAddress> <macAddress>...</macAddress> <!--...more "macAddress" elements...--> <name>...</name> <name>...</name> <!--...more "name" elements...--> <peerBandwidth>...</peerBandwidth> <peerBandwidth>...</peerBandwidth> <!--...more "peerBandwidth" elements...--> <property>...</property> <property>...</property> <!--...more "property" elements...--> <state>...</state> <state>...</state> <!--...more "state" elements...--> <supportedBandwidth>...</supportedBandwidth> <supportedBandwidth>...</supportedBandwidth> <!--...more "supportedBandwidth" elements...--> <tables>...</tables> <tables>...</tables> <!--...more "tables" elements...--> <tier>...</tier> <tier>...</tier> <!--...more "tier" elements...--> <timeStamp>...</timeStamp> <timeStamp>...</timeStamp> <!--...more "timeStamp" elements...--> </properties> </nodeConnectorProperties>

element.name: nodeConnectors
element.examplexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <nodeConnectors> <nodeConnectorProperties> <nodeconnector id="..." type="..."> <node id="..." type="..." /> </nodeconnector> <properties> <actions>...</actions> <actions>...</actions> <!--...more "actions" elements...--> <advertisedBandwidth>...</advertisedBandwidth> <advertisedBandwidth>...</advertisedBandwidth> <!--...more "advertisedBandwidth" elements...--> <bandwidth>...</bandwidth> <bandwidth>...</bandwidth> <!--...more "bandwidth" elements...--> <buffers>...</buffers> <buffers>...</buffers> <!--...more "buffers" elements...--> <capabilities>...</capabilities> <capabilities>...</capabilities> <!--...more "capabilities" elements...--> <config>...</config> <config>...</config> <!--...more "config" elements...--> <latency>...</latency> <latency>...</latency> <!--...more "latency" elements...--> <macAddress>...</macAddress> <macAddress>...</macAddress> <!--...more "macAddress" elements...--> <name>...</name> <name>...</name> <!--...more "name" elements...--> <peerBandwidth>...</peerBandwidth> <peerBandwidth>...</peerBandwidth> <!--...more "peerBandwidth" elements...--> <property>...</property> <property>...</property> <!--...more "property" elements...--> <state>...</state> <state>...</state> <!--...more "state" elements...--> <supportedBandwidth>...</supportedBandwidth> <supportedBandwidth>...</supportedBandwidth> <!--...more "supportedBandwidth" elements...--> <tables>...</tables> <tables>...</tables> <!--...more "tables" elements...--> <tier>...</tier> <tier>...</tier> <!--...more "tier" elements...--> <timeStamp>...</timeStamp> <timeStamp>...</timeStamp> <!--...more "timeStamp" elements...--> </properties> </nodeConnectorProperties> <nodeConnectorProperties> <!--...--> </nodeConnectorProperties> <!--...more "nodeConnectorProperties" elements...--> </nodeConnectors>

element.name: nodeProperties

element.examplexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <nodeProperties> <node id="..." type="..." /> <properties> <actions>...</actions> <actions>...</actions> <!--...more "actions" elements...--> <advertisedBandwidth>...</advertisedBandwidth> <advertisedBandwidth>...</advertisedBandwidth> <!--...more "advertisedBandwidth" elements...--> <bandwidth>...</bandwidth> <bandwidth>...</bandwidth> <!--...more "bandwidth" elements...--> <buffers>...</buffers> <buffers>...</buffers> <!--...more "buffers" elements...--> <capabilities>...</capabilities> <capabilities>...</capabilities> <!--...more "capabilities" elements...--> <config>...</config> <config>...</config> <!--...more "config" elements...--> <latency>...</latency> <latency>...</latency> <!--...more "latency" elements...--> <macAddress>...</macAddress> <macAddress>...</macAddress> <!--...more "macAddress" elements...--> <name>...</name> <name>...</name> <!--...more "name" elements...--> <peerBandwidth>...</peerBandwidth> <peerBandwidth>...</peerBandwidth> <!--...more "peerBandwidth" elements...--> <property>...</property> <property>...</property> <!--...more "property" elements...--> <state>...</state> <state>...</state> <!--...more "state" elements...--> <supportedBandwidth>...</supportedBandwidth> <supportedBandwidth>...</supportedBandwidth> <!--...more "supportedBandwidth" elements...--> <tables>...</tables> <tables>...</tables> <!--...more "tables" elements...--> <tier>...</tier> <tier>...</tier> <!--...more "tier" elements...--> <timeStamp>...</timeStamp> <timeStamp>...</timeStamp> <!--...more "timeStamp" elements...--> </properties> </nodeProperties>

element.name: nodes
element.examplexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <nodes> <nodeProperties> <node id="..." type="..." /> <properties> <actions>...</actions> <actions>...</actions> <!--...more "actions" elements...--> <advertisedBandwidth>...</advertisedBandwidth> <advertisedBandwidth>...</advertisedBandwidth> <!--...more "advertisedBandwidth" elements...--> <bandwidth>...</bandwidth> <bandwidth>...</bandwidth> <!--...more "bandwidth" elements...--> <buffers>...</buffers> <buffers>...</buffers> <!--...more "buffers" elements...--> <capabilities>...</capabilities> <capabilities>...</capabilities> <!--...more "capabilities" elements...--> <config>...</config> <config>...</config> <!--...more "config" elements...--> <latency>...</latency> <latency>...</latency> <!--...more "latency" elements...--> <macAddress>...</macAddress> <macAddress>...</macAddress> <!--...more "macAddress" elements...--> <name>...</name> <name>...</name> <!--...more "name" elements...--> <peerBandwidth>...</peerBandwidth> <peerBandwidth>...</peerBandwidth> <!--...more "peerBandwidth" elements...--> <property>...</property> <property>...</property> <!--...more "property" elements...--> <state>...</state> <state>...</state> <!--...more "state" elements...--> <supportedBandwidth>...</supportedBandwidth> <supportedBandwidth>...</supportedBandwidth> <!--...more "supportedBandwidth" elements...--> <tables>...</tables> <tables>...</tables> <!--...more "tables" elements...--> <tier>...</tier> <tier>...</tier> <!--...more "tier" elements...--> <timeStamp>...</timeStamp> <timeStamp>...</timeStamp> <!--...more "timeStamp" elements...--> </properties> </nodeProperties> <nodeProperties> <!--...--> </nodeProperties> <!--...more "nodeProperties" elements...--> </nodes>

group.name: NodeConnectorProperties
group.documentation: The class describes set of properties attached to a node connector

group.name: NodeProperties
group.documentation: The class describes set of properties attached to a node

operation.name: GET
operation.documentation: Retrieve a list of all the nodes and their properties in the network
operation.parameter: The container for which we want to retrieve the list

outValue.documentation: A list of Pair each pair represents a org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.Node and Set of org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.Property attached to it.

operation.statusCode: Operation successful
The containerName is not found
One or more of Controller Services are unavailable

operation.name: POST
operation.parameter: Name of the Container

outValue.documentation: Response as dictated by the HTTP Response Status code

operation.statusCode: Operation successful
The containerName is not found
One or more of Controller Services are unavailable

operation.name: GET
operation.documentation: Retrieve a list of all the node connectors and their properties in a given node
operation.parameter: The container for which we want to retrieve the list
Type of the node being programmed
Node Identifier as specified by org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.Node

outValue.documentation: A List of Pair each pair represents a org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.NodeConnector and its corresponding org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.Property attached to it.

operation.statusCode: Operation successful
The containerName is not found
One or more of Controller Services are unavailable

operation.name: DELETE
operation.documentation: Delete a property of a node
operation.parameter: Name of the Container
Type of the node being programmed
Node Identifier as specified by org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.Node
Name of the Property specified by org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.Property and its extended classes

outValue.documentation: Response as dictated by the HTTP Response Status code

operation.statusCode: Operation successful
The Container Name or nodeId or configuration name is not found
One or more of Controller services are unavailable

operation.name: PUT
operation.documentation: Add a Name/Tier property to a node
operation.parameter: Name of the Container
Type of the node being programmed
Node Identifier as specified by org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.Node
Name of the Property specified by org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.Property and its extended classes
Value of the Property specified by org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.Property and its extended classes

outValue.documentation: Response as dictated by the HTTP Response Status code

operation.statusCode: Operation successful
The Container Name or nodeId or configuration name is not found
One or more of Controller services are unavailable

operation.name: DELETE
operation.documentation: Delete a property of a node connector
operation.parameter: Name of the Container
Type of the node being programmed
Node Identifier as specified by org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.Node
Type of the node connector being programmed
NodeConnector Identifier as specified by org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.NodeConnector
Name of the Property specified by org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.Property and its extended classes

outValue.documentation: Response as dictated by the HTTP Response Status code

operation.statusCode: Operation successful
The Container Name or nodeId or configuration name is not found
One or more of Controller services are unavailable

operation.name: PUT
operation.documentation: Add a Name/Bandwidth property to a node connector
operation.parameter: Name of the Container
Type of the node being programmed
Node Identifier as specified by org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.Node
Type of the node connector being programmed
NodeConnector Identifier as specified by org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.NodeConnector
Name of the Property specified by org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.Property and its extended classes
Value of the Property specified by org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.Property and its extended classes

outValue.documentation: Response as dictated by the HTTP Response Status code

operation.statusCode: Operation successful
The Container Name or nodeId or configuration name is not found
One or more of Controller services are unavailable

group.name: SwitchNorthbound
group.documentation: The class provides Northbound REST APIs to access the nodes, node connectors and their properties.
